Articles.Content:
From what I can tell by holding a ruler up to the screen, that thing is about 1,000km from the surface of Duna, give or take 200km because of how it is projected. I'm off to search for it. Did you manage to get into orbit around it, if that's even possible?

EDIT: I don't know who to trust right now!

Edited September 29, 2012 by Candre
Kosmo, you crazy. There's no second SSTV signal, and the magic boulder does not orbit Duna

Kosmo, you crazy. There's no second SSTV signal, and the magic boulder does not orbit Duna

I hate when you tease us... Anyways. I asked cleverbot:

Where is the magic boulder?

You're in the matrix.

CLEVERBOT HAS SPOKEN!

Kosmo, you crazy. There's no second SSTV signal, and the magic boulder does not orbit Duna

There is too a second SSTV signal:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/eiyra6jec0nm6lu/second%20SSTV%20signal.wav

Originally Posted by NovaSilisko

Kosmo, you crazy. There's no second SSTV signal, and the magic boulder does not orbit Duna

There is too a second SSTV signal:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/eiyra6jec0...V%20signal.wav

I dont know who to believe, the awesome person who made this, or the guy who has proof. Lets ask Cleverbot.

EDIT: Cleverbot is hopeless

EDIT2: Came online today and saw the decoded pictures of Kosmo's SSTV. I hate you Kosmo.

Edited September 30, 2012 by 0jam3290

I dont know who to believe, the awesome person who made this, or the guy who has proof. Lets ask Cleverbot.

EDIT: Cleverbot is hopeless

Decode the signal like I did, and you'll know.
Problem, officer?

Kosmo-not, I decoded the SSTV and saw the "interesting picture" you have there.

Mind explaining why you did it?
So what image does the SSTV produce then? Do I have to do it myself?

So what image does the SSTV produce then? Do I have to do it myself?

Lets just put it this way, Kosmo-not likes trolling.

In the moment I read about second SSTV, while Nova negate it, I thought I know what picture it will be. I cant decode those SSTVs, but I am pretty sure it will be this:

can anyone confirm?

In the moment I read about second SSTV, while Nova negate it, I thought I know what picture it will be. I cant decode those SSTVs, but I am pretty sure it will be this:

-snip-

can anyone confirm?

I can indeed, even though I knew before I decoded it (read my last post, it's a hint).

Did anyone actually work out the hint from Nova's mystery image here?

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/15728-UNOFFICIAL-FANMADE-0-17-Discussion-thread?p=227506&viewfull=1#post227506
Curse you, Kosmo-Not!

From r/kerbalspaceprogram...

(source: http://imgur.com/a/RAZbZ)

From r/kerbalspaceprogram...

-snip-

(source: http://imgur.com/a/RAZbZ)

I saw that too, however I don't think it's the magic boulder, I think it's some sort of mod/plugin.

I could be wrong though, like normal.

I saw that too, however I don't think it's the magic boulder, I think it's some sort of mod/plugin.

I could be wrong though, like normal.

It's not a mod. Sometimes near the poles the rocks appear to "float" in the air. When you see a rock sticking up out of the ground, you're only seeing half of it. The reason that one looks so big is because it's mesh is fully visible.

these are my 2 theorys

http://www.worldbuilders.org.uk/Mainpage/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/Untitled-2.png

sorry for the lack of a preview, Photobucket has borked for me. i uploaded it to my web to show you guys

these are my 2 theorys

http://www.worldbuilders.org.uk/Mainpage/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/Untitled-2.png

sorry for the lack of a preview, Photobucket has borked for me. i uploaded it to my web to show you guys

That's pretty smart, Too bad I'm horrible with space craft XD

It's not a mod. Sometimes near the poles the rocks appear to "float" in the air. When you see a rock sticking up out of the ground, you're only seeing half of it. The reason that one looks so big is because it's mesh is fully visible.

Yeah, I knew I would get it wrong, I haven't been to the poles yet so I wouldn't know. Anyway, I knew it probably wasn't the Magic Boulder as it seems an odd location from the speculation of the SSTV.

Le sigh about the trolls.

And clever bot isn't helping very much.

[ATTACH=CONFIG]33893[/ATTACH]
Guys, I was going to scan Eve and was wondering if there was anomalies there? Thanks.

I didn't detect any on Eve or Gilly.

But Eve is worth visiting just for the sheer beauty of it.
I have a feeling that the image from Duna doesn't even mean anything. Maybe the image is all there is to it.
Maybe a new one will be released on the 0.18 patch and it will get a lot stranger/interesting!
